findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: The finding indicates a potential vulnerability where an unauthorized script upgrade can occur.

findings.title: Launch function can be called internally without access control
findings.description: The launch function can be called internally without any access control checks, potentially allowing unauthorized access.

findings.title: setFeeReceivers function has no access control
findings.description: The setFeeReceivers function does not have any access control, allowing unauthorized users to modify fee receivers.

findings.title: setSwapBackSettings function has no access control
findings.description: The setSwapBackSettings function lacks access control, allowing unauthorized users to modify settings.

findings.title: setDistributionCriteria function has no access control
findings.description: The setDistributionCriteria function lacks access control, allowing unauthorized users to modify distribution criteria.

findings.title: setDistributorSettings function has no access control
findings.description: The setDistributorSettings function lacks access control, allowing unauthorized users to modify settings.

findings.title: Freeze Function Has No Access Control
findings.description: The freeze function can be used to stop users from buying, selling or transferring assets without any access control.

findings.title: Centralization Risk
findings.description: Active contract ownership identified which creates a risk of rug pull scams and centralization related risks are higher than common smart contract vulnerabilities.

findings.title: Rebase function can be called without proper validation
findings.description: The rebase function lacks proper input validation, allowing unauthorized or malicious calls.

findings.title: Vest function can be called without proper validation
findings.description: The vest function lacks proper input validation, allowing unauthorized access or malicious activities.

findings.title: Buy Back function can be called without proper validation
findings.description: The Buy Back function can be triggered without proper validation, potentially leading to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Burn function can be called without proper validation
findings.description: The burn function does not have proper validation, allowing it to be called under unintended circumstances.

findings.title: Mint function can be called without proper validation
findings.description: The mint function does not have proper validation checks, allowing unauthorized access and potential exploitation.

findings.title: Dividend function can be called without proper validation
findings.description: The distributeDividend function does not have proper input validation, allowing unauthorized calls.
